name: XCEL Industrial Supplies
tagline: Manufacturer of Wooden Pallets, Crates and Solutions Provider of Packaging Materials
history: Established as a manufacturing representative in the electronics industry and later expanded into various sectors
current_focus: Supply of pallets and other packaging solutions
sustainability_commitment: Committed to achieving the Circular Economy model and driving the Zero-Waste movement in Singapore

sustainability_programs.description: Target client's wooden waste through collection and sorting of imported wooden pallets/crates
services: Analysis of opportunities for repairing wooden pallets/crates
Upcycling damaged pallets into lifestyle products

sustainable_brand.name: CREUSE
sustainable_brand.description: Damaged pallets find new life as stylish upcycled lifestyle products

waste_philosophy: Advocate the importance of holding accountability to the creation of waste
